content.detailedDescription: On 11 september 2009 at 7:55 a friend and i took a walk with my dog.  we walked one block north of my condo to an open field.  i started to look up into the west sky and saw a sphere like object emitting light.  the object moved from west to east over our location  the object was very bright from all sides.  the object was about 500 to 1000 feet in the air.The object appeared to be emitting a glowing smoke or cloudy mist.  it looked to be about 10 ft. in diameter.  we stood there in amazement and watched the object pass over.  it took about 3 to 5 min. to move across the sky from west to east and then it disappeared.  the object made no sound at all.  the feelings we both had during the sighting was amazed and emotional.
content.summary: Sphere emitting bright star like light

content.detailedDescription:
At 2110 pacific standard time in sw sky appeared a tracer tail of yellow lights and there it was !!  like something out of the movies.  a disc shaped lighted object heading to the north. i could see it at roughly a 45 degree angle, hovering as lights in a horizontal line were moving in a chaser stream.  . . . .     . . .    . .     . . . . .  as if it was rotating as it moved to the north.   all i could do is feel it's presence. not to be cheesy, but "you just know" when you see something like this.  i was looking for green-blue lighted "stars" with occasional red light beacon flashes in the distance, as i had seen on august 24, 2009 from the same location at roughly 2200 hours.( that sighting, it hovered as a star for 30- 60 minutes as it faded into the western sky ). but this thing was close, at the tree tops, and yellowish lights.  at first i thought it was the goodyear blimp with the lighted sign on the side promoting tires, or something ?  first off, goodyear couldn't travel that fast, and second, it wouldn't have a tracer tail ( as if entering the atmosphere, as does the space shuttle when it leaves the atmosphere ).   this thing was more disc to oval shaped, with lights on the underside as i got a few seconds to see the underside.  my girlfriend thought there were two objects, as the angle of decent could be mis construed as such if the lights were around the perimeter, and not just the one side, ( rotating)?    mysterious stars and direction-changing lights have been observed in recent weeks, as was the aug. 24 sighting.  i just wanted to submit this information, in case there were other sightings in this area, or other flap areas to validate...
i'm new to all this, and really  am telling the truth.  do "they" know that i just finished ufos: operation trojan horse by john a. keel (1970)?  
great book !!  i didn't expect to actually "see one", although it was shockingly exciting.
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval
content.summary: Bright lights from south-west appeared with tracer tail, and traveled north in steady path to show moving lights in horizontal stream.

content.detailedDescription: I was on phone with my sister and looked out kitchen window to view pond in yard. towards the north i spotted at first what i described to my sister as a plane on fire but one i exited house an viewed it from yard it looked more like a cone/triangle shaped object that shifted forms somewhat as i viewed it. it was sometimes more triangle shaped than cone but the light on bottom remained what looked like a sphere of fire. after about 30 seconds i got off phone and told my sister to call my mom and tell her to look outside. i then called up my neighbor and talked to him for the duration of event. unfortunatly he was not home at the time but wanted to listen to my descriptions. i was honestly so amazed and scarred at what i was seeing i was glad to have his presense over the phone. i watched the 1st object for 2-3mins move slowly eastwards and hover before it slowly moved upwards and northeast gradually going over horizon. i rememeber telling my neighbor it was gone but i couldn't stop watching sky. my skygazing was rewarded about 30-45 seconds later when another similiar object appeared. this one hovered in sky near the location where 1st one did for about 1 minute before moving north and upwards thru the clouds. my feelings during this event were that i was seeing something i wasn't supposed to be seeing. a ufo here? how come theres not hundreds of other people able to see this. i left event deluding myself into writing it off as a flare and maybe it was. i'm no expert in non commercial aircraft. lately i'm feeling that i was lucky to see it. glad to share.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: 2 separate cones with red sphere on bottom which looked like it contained fire.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were coming back home to georgia after visiting family in south carolina. we were driving on the interstate..It was about 9 pm...I was looking up in the sky and saw some small lights from a distance...I told my wife and she said that it was a plane..Well all of a sudden the multi-colered light object we thought was a plane got huge in a matter of seconds and was coming towards us...It seemed like forever, but it probobly lasted about 10 seconds...It looked just like a disc...Like the old ufo pics you see...The lights were orange,white,and red...I am very sure that when it headed towards us that it was not a plane!!My wife said oh my god chris look! and we both were terrified...I just stared at it...And then all of a sudden, it vanished...I have always been the skeptic when it comes to "ufo's"...But there was no denying this.
content.summary: A huge object came towards my wife and i while we were in the car.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on i-5 at about milemarker 38.  i noticed a
very white sphere hovering just west of the freeway, northbound, at about 20
degrees above the freeway.  it was very bright and stationary.  in about 10
seconds it moved around the sky, but not streaking, it was just in one
place, then another, all within about a 5 inch range of my vision.  i tapped
my wife who was in the passenger seat sleeping, and i pointed to it.  just
as i pointed to it, it started to move around faster, from one place to
another.  then, quickly, it started to move from east to west at a very high
speed, then went at a 45 degree angle to the ground.   at no time was there
any other colors in the object, and there was no apparent streak as seen
with a meteor.  my wife doesn't believe in ufo's.  she said "what was that"
i said "ufo". she said, no way, that had to have been a rocket or something,
is there military bases in the area?...

shortly after, i noticed two airplanes in the vicinity with police lighting
on them.

it was a very wild experience.

at the time, the sun was set, but the area was getting thick with thunder
storms.  where the object was seen, it started in a dark part of the sky,
but ended in the more lit area of the sky.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unreal ufo over i-5 looking nw near kelso, exit 38

content.detailedDescription:
This started around 11:15pm at night. i noticed an extra bright star in the the western sky. it appeared to be flashing. i went to get my telescope to see if i could get a better view. i noticed once i looked through the telescope that there were flashing lights. the colors i was seeing were red, white and what appeared to be an aqua blue. the object appeared to stay in the same location for a while and then slowly began heading north/northwest. i noticed when it was in the northwest sky another one seemed to appear. it could have been there the whole time and i just didn't see it. the second one seemed to be further away. this lasted for about an hour. 

i decided to scope out the sky and i noticed another cluster of stars that didn't seem right. this time i was looking in the southern sky. i found the same object, i stopped counting after i found 10 of them. the characteristic was the same as the original object i observed. about the same distance away....Well maybe just a little further, same flashing lights.

it's still going on right now, it's difficult to see with the naked eye, you'd be better served if you had a telescope. i was able to spot the second cluster with the naked eye. what caught my attention was the odd placement of these objects in the sky, it just didn't seem like a pattern i was use to seeing. this is still going on right now...It's 12:15am on sunday, sept.13.

would love to know if anyone else reported this.
content.summary: Looked like a star, but had flashing lights, saw 2 first, then a cluster of five in different part of the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my son to school on schoenersville road in bethlehem, heading north.  we were late, so i was aggravated when we got stuck in traffic and i kept looking at the clock.  suddenly, when we were stopped at a red light on the bridge that spans rte. 22, my son shouted "mama, a ufo!"  at first i couldn't see it, then the light changed and i drove the car a few more feet before being stopped in traffic again.  i said, "sweetie, are you sure that it's not an airplane?  the airport is over there (i was talking about lehigh valley international airport, which is located about a mile from our location)."  he said, "no, it was moving in circles."  as he said this, i finally spotted it in the sky.  it was small from my perspective, maybe the size of a passenger plane, and i said again "it looks like a plane coming in for a landing," when it abruptly stopped in mid-air, and started moving in the opposite direction.  i got a good look at it, it was cigar shaped and it was a bright silver color that reflected the sunlight on that very clear and sunny morning.  from my perspective, it was on my left, and it moved back and forth several times.  i checked the clock, and it read 7:55.  i watched it move over route 22 for as long as morning rush hour permitted, then traffic started moving again, and my son gave me updates as to it's behavior. he shouted "it's getting bigger!"  and then, "it cloaked!!! it cloaked!!!" cloaked of course meaning that it disappeared, and i apologize that i cannot confirm this, since there was no convenient place to pull over and watch.
content.summary: My son spotted a shape in the sky as we sat in traffic.

content.detailedDescription:
We were out in our back yard sitting around the burn pit about eight pm and just watching the skys cause it was so bright and clear. my daughter and i were just talking and looking at mars and the milky way. when the fire started to go out we decided to come in so we were picking up our cushion when we both turned to the south eastern skys, we both saw a bright star but it was moving at a fast pace all of a sudden it got brighter and brighter, it got so bright it was blinding and then it was gone in a flash. we watched it, it lasted about five to ten minutes. it lite up the field behind our house. we just stood there looking at each other and said we just saw a ufo. we stayed out there and kept watching.  then we came in and we were shaking, scared, excited and bewildered.

i then called the police department and asked if anyone had report seeing a bright light in the sky, they said no but gave me a number to call in seattle to report ufos, so i called and reported it and they said something happened over seattle tonight.
content.summary: We were in the back yard watching skys when we saw in the eastern skys a bright star  but it was moving at a fast speed we watched it got so bright it was blinding and then it was gone in a flash

content.detailedDescription: Leaving for work ( midnight shift ) @ aprox 9:20 p.M. i observed a large bright star like light in the north sky. this would place the object north of brown city between marlette and sandusky mi / the sky was clear with normal stars visable in the night sky / the brightness and size of the object was what cought my attention / the color was more yellow than what a star would be / it also had a sharp outline or edge / light was bright and did not pulse / light was fixed and did not look to be moving / this was observed for aprox. 3 sec before light slowly dimed out / apox. 60 sec. later a light rose from ground level getting brighter as it rose to apox. two hands high from horizon / it then came to a stop getting as bright as the previously observed light for apox 2 sec. / the light then turned into a three branched capitol t shape star burst fading away / it took this light apox 3 sec. to rise from ground level to were it stopped / its color was the same yellow as the first light / it also was a steady light and did not pulse like a firework or flare
content.summary: Light's in sky between marlette and sandusky mi

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:10 pm on saturday, september 12, 2009 my husband and i were returning to our home in yacolt, washington from portland, oregon.  we had just entered the city limits of yacolt and were driving north on railroad avenue when a very bright light zoomed across the sky from east to west at a 45 degree downward angle.

when we first saw the light we thought it was an extremely bright and large meteor shooting across the sky.  it was very low in the sky a few hundred feet above the tree tops.

just as it was about to disappear from our view the object seemed to turn a bit and the setting sun shone on it.  we could then see that it was not a huge meteor but a triangular shaped object with lights underneath.  the lights were very large and we both saw five lights.

it was going very fast and was gone in seconds.  it was definitely not an airplane or other 'normal' light in the sky.

we were surprised at seeing this object and compared our observations.  we then drove toward the west to see if we could see anything more but did not see anything but the normal night sky.
content.summary: Bright light streaking across sky turning and triangular shape w/lights visible

content.detailedDescription:
This one was moving at the usual speed.  at 2 minutes it slowed a bit and changed direction from about 5 degrees to the north of dead on east to around 13 degrees to the north yet still heading east.  as usual, no sound and no lights that blink.  my wife saw it but after so many, did not stay to watch the thing fade.  again about 3-4 times the size/brightness of jupiter.
again lower altitude.  will try to remember the camera next time.
content.summary: Another extremely bright star-like object flying w. to e.

content.detailedDescription: Driveing west on highway 61 towards wentzville mo. noticed something making a strange contrail in sky to the west. it was vertical not horizontal and the object continued straight up until it was no longer visable. it was very strange it looked to me like a missle launch from the western sky towards kc. just wondering if anyone else reported seeing this as well. there is no need to contact me unless someone did see it. my wife was with me as well. it was to far away to actually see what it was but it was moving slowly at first ( closer to the horizon ) and it seemed to go much faster as it went higher in the sky. it finally went so high up it went out of sight.
content.summary: Not ufo but looked like a missle launch

content.detailedDescription: My co-worker asked me to come out and see this. she was notified by a customer. i met her out front of our store and there was the image. the sun was setting so the sky was getting darker. the image was roughly the quarter the size of the moon. almost looked like a projection image (probably because of it's great distance. it was as bright as the moon. my guess is that it sun light was reflecting off it. it didn't appear to move at all. often was blocked by clouds. we could not tell if it was outside the atmosphere or in the stratosphere. it looked like a tear drop but almost seemed like a perfect half circle with smaller tail pointing down. when holding my arm outstretched next to the image, it looked to be slightly smaller than my pinkie nail. this must've been massive. no way could this be a weather balloon. the light reflected was not like a star, but like the moon. a woman standing with us said she had watched the object from downtown phoenix, which would've mean with traffic, that this had been in the sky for 45 + minutes. i called fox 10 news desk to report it and to get a reaction and the man on the phone said that he had received a few calls about the object. when i asked him, "what is it? i have to know!" he said, "don't know, we'll let you know." there was no news broadcast of the sighting that evening. this truly was like nothing i had ever seen in the sky before. it was something new to me. i felt anxious and wished that i could see through a telescope. i and those around me agreed that this was something never seen before and extraordinary.
content.summary: High northeast sky, large white object floating in place.

content.detailedDescription:
there was a nigth of 1964 arown midnigth in santo domingo city o dominican republic, there was this giant rown mother ship that look like a floting city at about 2,000 feet higth moving real slow a producing a very low sound like a bee hive, that nigth was a total lunar eclipse.
      the other one happen in riverside park manhhatan, new york by a 93 st. ther was this botton part of a sphere forming two iluminated "c" shape rotating and translating movements, it happens arown 1977 arown 10:30 pm. while i was practicing karate with my frien william who was a brown belt and i was a black belt., plus many other cases on which i have written in my book which i haven't published yet becouse i can't afford
content.summary: Mothership.

content.detailedDescription: It is as i said triangle in shape, all metalic color,i could find no entrance into this thing,my question to your group is would you pay to be taken up in the allegheny national forest to see this thing,and if you would pay, how much? i wony include any photos because i want to be paid to take anyone up there to see it,and i know our wonderful goverment would probably say yeah they pay to see and once i took them to it i'm sure i would never see a dime,if your not interested just send me back a reply and you'll never hear any more from me. sincerly, anthony russell
content.summary: Found an down aircraft in allegheny national forest,can absolutly say it's nothing like anything i have ever saw,i'am a bigfoot researcher,i'm in the woods frequently,that's what had me out in the allegheny national forest to begin with on 09/09/2009.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking random pictures of stunt planes during an airshow in north carolina. i then downloaded the digital pictures and noticed an orb directly above the stunt plane. i was unable to see the orb at the time of taking the picture. frankly i'm not surprised. this isn't the first picture i've taken with orbs in the photos.
content.summary: Noticed an orb above an arial stunt plane after downloading digital pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
Arrived at hunting camp. got out of truck, looked up in north sky. my girlfriend and i noticed two ufo's spiraling, leaving a comet like tail with a hook shaped that followed the objects.
i snapped one pic with my digital camera, then put it on video mode. the second object appeared shortly after the first. objects headed east toward lake huron, then faded out.
content.summary: Observed two spiraling ufo's with comet like tails

content.detailedDescription:
On the above mentioned date and time, i was on duty outside my facility. i work for the local law enforcment agency. im always stargazing because there have been alot of activity recently. last night, i noticed what appeared to be a very high altitude object moving from north to south at about my 12 o'clock position or directly overhead. i would estimate it to be flying at about 30k feet. very small dim, no strobes or anticollisionlights. soon after i noticed it, there was a flash infront of this dim object. the flash took shape of an even bigger sphere, i would calculate it to be 5 times as big and brighter then the first. i started moving away from the first dim object also in a southern direction. as soon as it was visible, 4 seconds later in a flash it was gone. the first dim object continued on its souther direction until it was not visible. a minute later, the first dim object was seen moving back north in its original flight path that it took going south. still moving very fast. within 2 minutes it was no longer visible. 40 minutes later when i arrived home, again i noticed this dim object kind of flying in a skipping motion or zig zagging motion from north to south over again its original flight path. 

no reported a month ago, my wife and i saw a dim object no collision lights following a bigger sphere from south to north directly overhead at about 20 thousand or so feet. very high altitude craft. the first object or sphere was very bright and moving extremely fast. it covered roughly from the 9 oclock position to the 3 oclock position overhead in less than 3 minutes. the second object much dimmer was a bit slower, it made a 90 degree right bank then 3 seconds later again a 90 degree left bank to its original course north. we did not see either again.
content.summary: Fighter interceptor(s) chasing object

content.detailedDescription:
I had typed a full report but when i submitted it, the data had cleared because it told me i had forgotten to put my last name. now i don't feeling like going into that much detail because i spent a lot of time on that and it had disappeared. to sum this up, it was night and i was walking my dog at 11:30 pm along beach ave. in la grange park and i stopped near the cook county highway department. it was a perfectly clear night and i had looked up and saw an object in the sky at some distance north northwest of my position and it was bright and star-like. i had never seen anything like that and i knew what was in the sky because of my position so close to o'hare airport. there was also commercial airliners outside the vicinity of it and imagined that the pilots and passengers could probably have a good view of it. it was very strange indeed but i didn't want to be anywhere close it. 

i watched it for about 15 minutes as it just hung there glowing brightly and looked around to see if anything else was going on in the sky at the same time. i hoped that there would be some kind of explanation of this like a flare or something. just as that crossed my mind two fighter jets going around mach 1 came screaming out of the left corner of my view and passed the object. i watched if the fighters had circled around but my vision was blocked by the tops of the trees in the forest nearby. when i had turned to watch the object again i got to see it for about 2 more minutes and it had suddenly winked out. 

i knew that night something was going down because air force fighter drills with flares are not usual around my parts and the jets came later than the glowing light so it couldn't have been a flare. i was way too bright and way too big. i tried to figure this out in my head as i walked my dog home. i am 18 years old and i had been living in the neighborhood most of my life but i hadn't seen anything like that and i had chills going up my spine for the rest of the night. i decided to post this because this has to coincide with a sighting report i found near my area in chicago in 2007 where a man named alex newton reported a star-like objects over lake michigan while waiting for a metra train in the city during a storm in which fighter jets had chased the objects away. i hadn't reported it because i feared criticism that i had got from my friends because of it and that people would think i was crazy or joking around. i was always skeptical of ufo's and things like that but this recent experience has made a believer out of me and i want to know the truth.
content.summary: Large, bright star-like object

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back garden playing with the cat. when i looked up, in an area of trees was what i thought were three birds. i decided to watch them because they appeared to be flying strangely. a few seconds later i realized they were not birds. as the vehicle moved towards me, it was climbing rapidly with the chevrons spinning at a constant speed. from the time i first saw it had probably climbed ten thousand feet and was between ten to fifteen thousand feet. finally, a few seconds later, it was directly overhead. then it just disappeared. one second it was there, the next second it wasn't. it had gone into another dimension. it made my day. i have wanted to see a ufo all my life, and now it has finally happened.
content.summary: Round disk with chevrons on the underside.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville:  first ufo at 8:23 pm.  looked like two pyramids put together, flew over trees at north end of yard as viewed from deck.  decided to chase it as it was going pretty slow.  as i went to car to put tripod/cam in, saw another one followed by large white orb (similar to one over hot tub on sept 1st).  ran to back yard and filmed both as they went same path heading easterly direction up road (rather shaky, i might add). 

as i went up road saw to my left another one heading the same direction. pulled in to gravel road by new development on haymaker farm road and filmed it flying low and silent towards franklin estates (it flew over houses).  figured they were coming from thick woods that would be visible from farm land across from my house which has high observation point.  didn't even get to top of hill and saw good sized orange orb hovering over woods at edge of where i filmed the plasma ball one that turned into a fake aircraft.

filmed it and it remained an orb... then it dimmed and flickered/blinked then went out.  i see this blinking all the time before the "fake planes" in the sky (and nick-named them 'blinkies').  they precede the "fake planes/helicopters because they are them.  look for random white strobe-like flashes in the sky around dusk and later.

drove to top of farm field and saw what i thought would be another one in the approximately east direction, low over trees.  filmed it as it traveled approx. west.  went below treeline and then saw another one heading the same way.  filmed it.  upon zooming in, saw it to appear to be a flaming orb like so many have reported.  it traveled pretty slowly towards the west also.  went low enough to go below treeline (i'm at top of hill with thin line of trees lining field).  i opened car door and stood in door well with foot in open window to get better shot.

the most amazing thing is that, upon blow up of the stills grabbed from video, is that they weren't really flames,  they seem to be it in the process of morphing (see attached 2 pics)!  as evidenced by the video catching it transforming and morphing into what would appear to most people as a helicopter!  it was silent this time, but i have footage of other 'weird helicopters' that did make a sound, looked really strange, and the sound seemed 'too harmonic' for a regular man-made one.  now that i have visual proof of the morphing, perhaps you'll want to see those too.

i find it incredible that no investigator has ever been here!  maybe they are sending a 'mind block' to keep you guys away.  i don't know...

i do know they are visiting here regularly enough for me to film them here and north of downtown pittsburgh.  and, if people would just spend their evenings looking at the sky instead of being inside, they would probably see them too (of course, they might appear as aircraft by that time, though).  proven by the 'rash' of orange ufos on 4th of july & sightings mostly by smokers and people with dogs.

attached is a video of another one at 10:07 pm on same night that didn't make it into part 1 and part 2 of my youtube videos (because there's a 10 minute limit).  here's the addresses of the videos:

ufo invasion part 1:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=a4emu44h1qs
ufo invasion part 2:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=dmkfniby8ja

there were so many that night, i'd estimate at least 15-20 during the whole evening.  one even 'buzzed' me again in the hot tub at 11:43 pm (attracted to the bubbling water?)!

don't worry... they seem to be harmless & peaceful.  i hope they introduce themselves soon... i wanna meet them.
content.summary: Murrysville: multiple types & flaming orb turns into fake helicopter

content.detailedDescription: A fireball traveling at an amazing rate of speed headed towards the earth from outer space.  i was seated in the passanger side of a big rig, and my friend sherry was driving and lili was sitting in the middle of us.  i saw a huge fireball going through the sky, and as we drove i yelled at sherry to pull over and stop the truck because it looked like it was headed straight towards us.  sherry pulled the truck over and we got out to witness this amazing event unfolding before our very eyes.  there were other vehicles that were traveling on i-10 that night who also pulled over.  we watched this fireball getting closer, and closer to us and we just stood in awe.  as it approached the ground, it stopped dead in its tracks and just hovered there.  it felt, and sounded like it was pulsing and it just hovered there for a long time.  it then split into two balls of fire and started moving in and out of each other, and as it continued to move its speed accelerated by the second.  it looked like two rays of light moving in and out of each other, and then it formed together as one and stood dead in its tracks.  hovering there pulsing, and then it landed on the ground.  from the time that it landed on the ground to the time that we all just got into our vehicles and just drove away, i cannot remember anything.  the next thing that i remember after it landed on the ground is all of us getting into the vehicles and driving away.  sherry, lili, and me did not say a word to each other all the way to phoenix.  i would like to be regressed so that i can get back that time that is missing and remember what happened.  i have been looking for it ever since in the night sky, and during the day.  i felt an intelligence from it that is amazing.  to this day i am still in awe of what i saw and experienced.  it changed my life forever.  i am extremely intelligent, and i will never forget the parts that i do remember from that night.  i would like to be regressed so that i can recollect the entire event that unfolded before my eyes.  i do not think that i lost sight of the object, i think that for whatever reason, we all just left.
content.summary: A huge fireball travelling at an amazing speed

content.detailedDescription:
Object was first observed while traveling south on azhwy 87 through the gila indian reservation in the vicinity of the blackwater trading post, at approximately 1815 hrs.  the object was significantly brighter than anything else appearing in the northern sky at this time.  the initial impression was that it could possibly be the landing lights of a commercial aircraft on approach (which frequently fly over the area).  however the size and brightness of the object would have indicated that the aircraft would have been flying much lower than usual.  given the time of day, there was still a significant amount of sunlight which should have made the shape of any aircraft visible, none was observed.

upon closer inspection the object seemed to maintain a stationary position.  the initial color of the observed object was a very bright "clean" white light.  the exact shape of the object was difficult to determine due to its luminescence, but was roughly circular/spherical.

the object was observed further upon arriving in coolidge az, approximately 5-10 minutes later.  the object had not seemed to change position, luminosity or color during this time frame.  

the object remained stationary in the sky north/nw of coolige az for the next 25-40 minutes.  the brightness of the object remained constant with the exception of a slight dimming effect when occasional clouds seemingly passed between the object and observers.  the color of the object changed from a "clean", bright white light to an orange/yellow to an orange to a red color during the 25-40 minutes it was observed.  this change in color seemed directly proportional to the degree with which the sun past below the horizon.  during this time, while the color changed, the brightness did not seem to change.

as the sun dropped below the horizon the object had taken on a distinctly red coloration.  a few minutes later a cloud seemed to pass in front of the object which remained visible, though slightly less bright.  during this time behind the cloud, the object steadily faded in brilliance until it was no longer visible.  when the clouds passed and clear sky appeared the object was still not visible.  the object did not reappear.  no sounds, sensations or movements were associated with the object.  the only feelings were those of curiosity as to the nature of the object.
content.summary: Prominent stationary luminous object observed prior to and during sunset in sky north of coolidge az

content.detailedDescription: 5  orange vertical objects gliding at 3000 feet moved in sequence from east to northwest then disappeared north of  hwy 48 just west of frederic wisconsin. we viewed from round lake and last one went nearly over our head. the objects were silent, propelled and illuminated in orange. estimate size that of a roadside pine tree. we saw first one come up over east side of lake then 4 more came in sequence. we did not have a camers.
content.summary: 5 orange objects @ 3000 feet moving nw.

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 5:50pm on 09/11/09, i was sitting in the front yard of my house looking north/northeast at an approaching plane, when i noticed a circular object that had a white/grey light to it.  the house sits facing north, and from this point one can see all the airplanes coming and going from sky harbor airport.  as reference, the object in question was as big and bright as the lights on the approaching planes but it was further way. it almost looked like a very small moon.  it was odd enough that it grabbed my attention and i ran inside to get my cheap binoculars and i was able to make out a triangular shaped blob, but it was fuzzy around the edges.  my binoculars only focus up to 1000 meters.  
i observed this object for 20 minutes as clouds from an approaching storm started to pass in front of it.  it was bright enough to see it through some of the thinner clouds.  too me it seemed to be above and beyond the mcdowell mountains east of scottsdale.  i lost sight of it once the storm clouds approached. 
this object stayed in the same place during my sighting.
later in the evening, after the storm moved away, i went back outside to see if it was still there, but it was gone. nothing similar to that was present in the sky.
content.summary: Stationary bright white light northeast of tempe/scottsdale

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside @ 3:28 to have a smoke & noticed object, thougt it most likly a star or distant aircraft in se sky about 30 degrees above horizon, made note of time. went outside again at approx. 5:15, object was still there, watched with naked eyes(5 min.) then with 15x binoculars. managed to get my mother out to observe it and she was as intrigued as i (unusual in itself). object was distant (at lest 5 miles to low orbit) and appeared round or possibly elongated diamond about 1/2 the size of venus which was also visible to the left in the east. at times a small, "steady" white light would briefly appear right under the object(for 15 to 30 sec.)object seemed to flash a bright white light at irregular intervals and had prismatic like sparkle- emiting beautiful bright-vivid colors across the visible spectrum. i took several pictures with a sony handi-cam but object just looks like a regular star -exactly like the picture sent in by previous wa witness. i watched the object until it faded - like a star does with the rising sun. i plan on creating a graphic to relay what i saw soon, and might submit later if anyone is interested
perhaps a satellite in geo-sync. orbit? it was beautiful to watch - needless to say i'll be looking for it to show up again.
thank you
content.summary: Star-like(1/2 size of venus), stationary, multi-colored-spakling like a diamond.

content.detailedDescription:
I cant recall an exact date. i was a kid approx8 yrs old. my dad, my brother pat and i were on our way back from rapid city sd late one evening when a bright white light flew over head. we were on i 90 headed west approx at the blackhawk exit outside of rapid city sd and my dad pulled over on shoulder to watch it. with in a few minutes it took off like a shot and 2 jet fighters flew overhead chasing the object. we never knew what it was and from all reports neither did the airforce.
       this is only a touch of what i observed growing up in sturgis from age 5 till 20. as you know ellsworth airbase was very close and there were missle silos everywhere.It was amazing all the activity we observed sitting on top of our hill on weber drive in sturgis. my dad was amazed when i reminded him of ot all and he remembers alot as well.
content.summary: Bright light flying low over head while were on our way home from rapid city sd

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer night and i wasn't doing anything at the time. i was just sitting down in the dark trying to cool off. i looked at the time, the time was approximately 12:00am. i was about to go to sleep on the couch. as soon as i went to lie down i saw two bright lights. i ignored it for a few minutes just realizing the lights were not normal. the lights in the sky were the same size as the sun. no airplane or helicopter could have a bright light like what i witnessed. it looked like a massive star continuously glowing. the colours of the bright lights were yellow when i was looking at it. i felt happy and calm and my eyes wanted to blink but i was amazed so much. all thoughts in my head eventually went away. when the two ufo's turned towards the city the shape was a silhouette of half a circle. then they were traveling faster than any object i saw in my life. i just lost sight of them when were heading towards the city. (i'm sorry if i don't have a recording, i was just more amazed with the ufo more than my mobile phone)
content.summary: Two ufo's witnessed at night near melbourne city

content.detailedDescription: It was a very clear night. i was lying outside in my yard gazing at the stars, when i saw the first flash which was due north. the flash was so quick i chalked it up to my eyes just playing tricks on me, but a few seconds later another blue/white flash which appeared to go just from above the horizon, to straight into the ground. the weird part is, it seemed to be within a couple of hundred feet of me. i grabbed my cell phone to check the radar and local lightning data for my area(i have weather service on my phone) and all was clear. this all happened around 01:30 a.M. i'm a photographer, so i decided to go inside and grab my camcorder and camera to see if i could get something strange on video. as soon as i got up and started walking to the house(02:07 a.M.) i saw a cobalt blue flash toward the ene. it only lasted as long as say a camera flash, but it had a fairly distinct shape to it, like a cigar. a few seconds later an even bigger blue flash in the shape of a square on a slight uphill tilt towards me. it lit up the same area for about 1.5 seconds and then just disappeared as if someone cut off a switch . everytime it appeared to be semi-transparent. i know it is not likely that it was some kind of power failure due to no lights inside or out flickered, dimmed, etc at the time of said event, or shortly after. 10 minutes later another white flash, but no definite shape. i am a huge skeptic when it comes to ufo's, ghost, esp, etc. i don't believe in any of it. i know there has to be a logical explanation for this phenomena.
content.summary: Huge blue flash. lit up entire ene quadrant of the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i drove up to my mom's house in tempe, az and as i exited the passenger side of the car i looked up in the sky. a bright circular light in the north east, that resembled a little moon, caught my attention. the closest i can describe the size of the circular light is the size of a traffic light from across street. it was much too big for an airplane or a star/planet. this was at 6:48pm pacific/mountain time. the light was about as bright as the moon on a clear day and didn't seem to move the entire 13 minutes or so that we watched it. within the first few seconds of me watching this light i asked my wife what it was and she replied that she didn't know. so i told her to call my brother who has binoculars. as she went inside to call him i remained outside watching the light as clouds would pass in front of it yet i was still able to see it quite clearly from behind the scattered dark clouds. for a brief moment i wondered if it were just the moon hiding behind the clouds but then i remembered that when i first seen it there were no clouds in front of it. my brother and mom had come out to see this light and luckily got to witness it as well. unfortunately though as soon as we were able to find the binoculars the clouds had covered the light which was barely visible from behind the clouds yet still visible. eventually at about 7:02 pm the dark clouds had covered the light completely and when there was an opening in the clouds we no longer seen the light. i'm very aware that there was a space shuttle landing this evening but it landed in california at 5:53 pm as to where i witnessed this ufo at 6:48 pm. not to mention the light was stationary for nearly 15 minutes, from what i had seen. needless to say, all of us that had seen it, were very baffled and would like to know what it was that we had seen.
content.summary: At 6:48 my wife, my brother, my mom and i all saw what looked like a very small moon in the north east sky in tempe, az.
